title: École de Platon
description:
Based on a true story...

In 1923, Osaka was gathered at Plato's "Kuraku" editorial department,

In the center of the youth, Kawaguchi Matsutaro, Naoki sanjūsan (later Naoki Sanjūgo)

The desire to draw a part of Japan literary history in the late Taisho period and early Showa era.

Following the first chapter of the writer, chapter 2 of the Illustrated painter began!
